channel.title: My Camel Spider Vs. A Black Widow (VIDEO & PICS)
channel.description:
My sister found this in my house so I caught it and decided to show you guys fighting a blackwidow here is the link:
[size=24pt][u][i][b]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xx-HSWOjAFM[/b][/i][/u][/size]
I will be taking more vids showing it grow. Thay can grow up to 3ft. They can scream (not really loud but they can), highly aggressive! Tune in to see more! Right now its about 3 inches long.
Here are some facts I found on a camel spider:
a camel spider can run about 10 mph. they have a terrifying scream while they run Camel Spiders can jump 4 or more feet into the air can grow to be the size of a dinner plate Camel spiders typically feed on insects, scorpions, or lizards and often eat so much that they become bloated and can hardly move
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/camel-spider.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/camel_spider.jpg[/img]
[u][i][b]View these Pics at your own risk, not recommended for those with a weak stomach! you can google all the images by searching for 'camel spider bites'[/b][/i][/u]
http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/images.jpg http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/images3.jpg http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/images2.jpg http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/images1.jpg http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/CAMELS1.jpg

item.title: My Camel Spider Vs. A Black Widow (VIDEO & PICS)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

marcbob:

Thats scary shit. I wouldnt want to live where you live. Although i live in detroit so I got other shit to deal with

I’m only 40 minutes north of you lol.

marcbob:

Holy Shit. Damn im lucky the worst thing in Michigan is a bee haha

I was in Mississippi for almost 5 years. Down there, we had Black Widow, Brown Widow, Brown Raclous (not sure how thats spelled), Bannana Spider, Rattle Snake (good eaten), Alligators (FUN AS HELL to go tubing around lolz), and much much more.

@TOPIC - I thought this was a fight was hoping to see some biting and stuff going on. That was just a spider having dinner.

Read full topic
